scripts.preinstall: [ "$IS_CONTAINER" != 1 ] && echo "Installing packages is not permitted outside of a container!" 1>&2 && exit 1; exit 0
scripts.predev: [ "$IS_CONTAINER" != 1 ] && echo "Running the application is not permitted outside of a container!" 1>&2 && exit 1; exit 0
scripts.prebuild: [ "$IS_CONTAINER" != 1 ] && echo "Building the application is not permitted outside of a container!" 1>&2 && exit 1; exit 0
scripts.prestart: [ "$IS_CONTAINER" != 1 ] && echo "Starting the applicaiton is not permitted outside of a container!" 1>&2 && exit 1; exit 0
